heisigStory: In frame 10 we referred ahead to this full character from which the primitive for needle (on the right) derives. Since we already expect that needles are made of metal, let us picture a set of solid gold darning needles to complete the kanji.
koohiiStory1: Remember the story of the needle in the haystack. Why would someone even look for a needle if it wasn´t a GOLD NEEDLE?
koohiiStory2: A golden needle is worth ten times more than an ordinary needle.
myStory: cây kim.mười vàng cũng quý như cây kim
